title: Vô Cực Tam Quốc - Vo Cuc Tam Quoc
description:
Vô Cực Tam Quốc - Thách thức cực hạn với những trận đại chiến tam quốc cam go khốc liệt, tái hiện hệ thống trận đồ 3D và chiến thuật tuyệt đỉnh trong lịch sử tam quốc chí. Thể loại xây dựng đội hình một  cách đa dạng chắc chắn chiếm trọn tình cảm của những ai yêu thích dòng game tam quốc.

Kết hợp giữa: Thẻ tướng chiến thuật - Nhập vai và Hành động, Vô Cực Tam Quốc cho phép người chơi thỏa sức thể hiện khả năng xây dựng đội hình theo hê, theo quốc gia. Bên cạnh đó, việc di chuyển tự do trong trận đánh cho phép đội hình có thể né skill tùy ý. 

Chiêu mộ 300 Thần tướng tam quốc
--- Nâng cấp đặc tính thần binh, kích hoạt thiên duyên
--- Liên minh 4 hệ tướng. Tướng theo quốc gia Tự do nâng cấp đến đặc tính thần binh.
--- Hệ thống mỹ nữ, pet và ngọc tỉ đa dạng, hấp dẫn.
Game thẻ tướng  Tam Quốc 
--- Tướng thủ di chuyển, đảo ngược thế trận – Cực hấp dẫn với khả năng di chuyển , né skill độc đáo.
--- Kỹ năng đa dạng,. Hiệu ứng kỹ năng đẹp mê hồn . 
--- Chiến thuật đội hình lên ngồi. Hệ tương sinh tương khắc .
--- Nâng cấp toàn diện từ game thu thanh truyền thống.
--- Skill 3D đẳng cấp, công thành hoành tráng.
--- Map 3D chuẩn nguyên tác truyền kỳ Tam Quốc Chí. Lồng tiếng Việt - Trung như xem phim.

Hội tụ tính năng đặc sắc của thế hệ game Vo Cuc Tam Quoc 

--- PVP đấu trường liên server 24/7 thời gian thực
--- Bang chiến, Quốc vương tranh đoạt cực hấp dẫn
--- Qua quan trảm tướng vui và kịch tính chưa từng có.
--- Liên minh bang hội, Danh nhân đường và thủ lĩnh khiêu chiến 


Vo Cuc Tam Quoc - Thách thức cực hạn. Phá vỡ mọi giới hạn của dòng game thẻ tướng tam quốc truyền thống.

title: Ultimate Glory - War of Kings
description:
Want to clash with 10 million global players? Dive into Ultimate Glory - War of Kings, the real-time-strategy MMO game.

Explore exotic magical lands thrown into chaos by terrifying monsters and powerful enemies. Choose your favorite heroes, make new friends, and charge fearlessly into war! Strike down your foes and build an empire!

FEATURES
● An Open-World Strategy Game
See, chat, and clash with other players in this MMO strategy game!
● Rule as the Emperor
Claim the throne in a battle royale for the kingdom! Will your legacy as a empire be just or cruel?!
● Powerful Heroes
Let them lead your kingdom to glory, or mix and match them to complete an RPG&SLG-style campaign that you will want to play again and again!
● Master Your Strategy
Think of new lineups and perfect your strategy!

Will you conquer enemy kingdoms and imprison rival lords? Will you liberate prisoners of war? Or will your kingdom and empire crumble to dust?

Write your own legacy, only in Ultimate Glory - War of Kings!

title: Meg 4-E
description: Meg 4E (Mind Exercise Games For Elderly) is a game created especially for the elderly generation to help with coordination, memory and strengthening the mind. Often times memory loss or slowness in comprehending daily task's is associated with elderly people who need that extra boost in their brain. Many times when the brain is unused for a long period of time, it will slow down, this is true for Elderly people especially, just tying up their shoes or remembering things like their birthday or where they put something they just had is a hard task for their brain to process.

title: Ocean Reef Life
description:
Dive into the virtual ocean of Ocean Reef Life, where you can grow and care for an aquatic wonderland of marine creatures from colorful tropical fish to predatory sharks and massive whales. 

Visit your reef in the palm of your hand anytime. Watch your fish grow from babies to adults, then breed more! Collect hearts to buy bigger and better creatures. Enjoy 100% 3D and free movement, including VR and AR camera modes. With tons of beautiful creatures to discover, 

-------------------------------------------------------------

- Fill your 3D reef with over 50 beautifully realistic virtual ocean creatures from tiny colorful clownfish to gigantic blue whales.

- Freely explore your reef with several camera modes, you'll feel like your swimming inside!

- Your creatures are always producing hearts! Keep them producing hearts and collect them when full.

- Watch your creatures grow from tiny babies to mature adults ready to breed and product hearts!

- Grow, collect, breed, repeat! Use Pearls to speed up the and you'll have a burgeoning reef in no time!

- Over 40 marine creatures to unlock and buy in the Shop, with new creatures added each monthly.

- Discover special breeding pairs and birth rare and valuable creatures. Complete goals to earn more bonuses and XP

- Spin the Reward Wheel for bonuses and find the hidden Clam to get a Pearl bonus! You can also watch ads or play demos for daily rewards.

- Go for #1! See how you rank against players throughout the world, your country, or your city/state

- Interact with other users, visit their reefs and buy creatures from the marketplace

title: Metal Knight
description:
After the nuclear war , systems and rules of the world were taken away.
The super weapon Leviathan is now in your hands!
Lead your fellows and purify this wasteland.
Game Features
-Modification! 40+ original vehicles! 100+ weapons! Create your powerful vehicle!
-Vulcan! Cannon! Missile! Burn the enemies to ashes!
-Rich story performances! Every character, every city, every property, has its own history!
-Heroes with different personalities, different races are waiting for your order!
-Challenge the powerful bosses who can destroy everything with just one hit!

title: Get Tanked
description:
Get Tanked, simple yet competitive.  Even in single player mode, 
this can leave you at the edge of your seat, ducking and dodging as you try to out-class, out-think and become a master at timed button precision. Get Tanked is built in real-time to shine light toward more competitive game-play. Another thing that stands out is a background music choice that gets you pumped up while you load your match. Among other thing like customization and power ups, aim to bring not just a new game to players but a whole new style of high speed competitive gaming to everyone!

title: Maya History - Indian Building Craft
description:
You are welcomed by the developer One Craft History!

Enjoy the blocky world of Maya History - Indian Building Craft.

Maya History - Indian Building Craft - build your own Maya temples! The study of rituals and hunting for wild animals in the ancient block world. A game for building houses in the block world, made from cubes, which you can use to build a temple. Create huts, make weapons with which you will go hunting and get food for your family. Get gold and nuggets, travel the jungle and enjoy nature Maya Craft.

Features:
- Exciting and easy game
- Ancient civilization research
- Awesome block world
- Hunting, gold mining, jungle and much more

Create your own ancient world in just a few minutes, just taking the necessary resources to build a future Aztec settlement with Maya History - Indian Building Craft.

title: Space Warship: N.O.V.A.S.T.O.R.M.[Sci-fi SLG MMO]
description:
☆'Space Warship' is a massive multi-player SLG and PvP online game where players battle in an unknown space. As a Space Warship commander, you must defend your base from the aliens, ally with other human forces and build your own empire. Only strongest commander can survive in this ruthless space war.☆

Game Features:
✔ Simple Design: Every thing in the game is easy to understand and control.
✔ Realistic Battles: Build your space military base, develop your spacecraft and assemble a mighty space fleet; Capture planets, and plunder resources as your power grows with your ambitions, conquests and killings.
✔ Easy Play: Get Credits from Event easily.
✔ Forge Alliances: You can forge your own alliance or join another alliance; solid cooperations bring benefits for everyone.
✔ Global Server: Players around the world gather here and play as your friends or foes, presenting you with an extraordinary experience transcending the boundaries of cultures and languages.
✔ Multiple Gameplay Styles: The game provides a variety of types of space battles such as PVPs, Alliance Wars, Throne Wars, Space Boss Battles and Alien Invasions, etc. Fight your way to victory!
✔ Master Your Space Strategy: Develop new space technology and perfect your strategy! Find the best way to strike down your opponent in this top-notch mobile MMO sci-fi space strategy game! 

-------------------------------------------------

title: Vikings: The Saga
description:
Welcome, brave viking!
Its 980 AD and you are the bravest viking of North. There are evil zombies who want to conquer your village. You goal is to defend it.

The innovative gameplay combines cards and classic tower defense genres. Art for cards is created in comics style.

Features:
• Awesome Bosses at the end of levels carefully created based on the north mythology: trolls, wolves and even gods.
• Survival levels. 
• World wide leaderboards.
• Quests for experienced users. 
• Great number of cards to collect and investigate.
• Challenge your friends in the Google Play Center.
• Awesome locations including villages, mountains, fjords, forests and dead lands.

We hope you will like our innovative tower defense game!

title: Pet TD
description:
Once upon a time there was a kingdom called Zegordia that lived with peace. But one day, monster race came to destroy Zegordia Kingdom. And in order to do that, the monsters need to destroy the five "Tree of Life" that creating shield for the kingdom. As for you, the gatekeeper of the Tree of Life, you need to guard them at all cost. If the Tree of Life destroyed then the shield will also be destroyed as well, and the Zegordia Kingdom will be vulnerable to monsters attack! With such responsibility, do you have what it takes as a gatekeeper ? 

Need some help ? Don't be afraid, our lovely cute pets ready to assist to defend the Tree of Life!


This game is an idle tower defense game, you will need a perfect strategy in order to win this game. By surviving to 60th wave, you are succesfuly defending one of the five Tree of Life (YES, Five!). Don't forget that they have cruel leaders, so good luck with that!


SUMMON (CUTE) PETS TO DEFEND THE TREE!
- Earn red crystal for defeating monsters and surviving wave after wave of the monsters attack 
- Use them to call forth a variety of pets, to aid your defense! Slime, dog, bird, elemental creature, even dragon!
- With dozen of pets that ready to help you, are you gonna survive the attack and come out as a hero, or facing the human extinction ?


CAST MIGHTY SPELLS. DESTROY THOSE WHO DARE TO COME NEAR THE TREE!
Just in case you forget, gatekeeper reinforced with powerful spells in order to succcessly guard the tree. So don't hesitate to use them as you like as long as you don't point it to the tree. If one spell is not enough, then two will be suffice, what about three ? (Pssh, monsters don't know about your power, poor them)

______________

PET TD – HIGHLIGHTS
______________
• Dozens of cute pets to summon
• Summon common, rare, epic and legendary pets
• Use your best strategy to place your pets for the best defense
• Upgrade your pets to increase their effectiveness
• Each pet has their own unique abilities and secondary powers
• Defend against endless waves of monsters
• Prepare to face variety of enemy bosses, each with their own unique skills
• Cast, upgrade, and unlock spells to destroy monsters, rebuild defences and buff your pets
• A combination game from tower defense and idle

ZEGORDIA KINGDOM'S FATE IS IN YOUR HAND, DOWNLOAD PET TD AND PROTECT THE TREE OF LIFE!
descriptionHTML:
Once upon a time there was a kingdom called Zegordia that lived with peace. But one day, monster race came to destroy Zegordia Kingdom. And in order to do that, the monsters need to destroy the five "Tree of Life" that creating shield for the kingdom. As for you, the gatekeeper of the Tree of Life, you need to guard them at all cost. If the Tree of Life destroyed then the shield will also be destroyed as well, and the Zegordia Kingdom will be vulnerable to monsters attack! With such responsibility, do you have what it takes as a gatekeeper ?

Need some help ? Don't be afraid, our lovely cute pets ready to assist to defend the Tree of Life!


This game is an idle tower defense game, you will need a perfect strategy in order to win this game. By surviving to 60th wave, you are succesfuly defending one of the five Tree of Life (YES, Five!). Don't forget that they have cruel leaders, so good luck with that!


SUMMON (CUTE) PETS TO DEFEND THE TREE!
- Earn red crystal for defeating monsters and surviving wave after wave of the monsters attack
- Use them to call forth a variety of pets, to aid your defense! Slime, dog, bird, elemental creature, even dragon!
- With dozen of pets that ready to help you, are you gonna survive the attack and come out as a hero, or facing the human extinction ?


CAST MIGHTY SPELLS. DESTROY THOSE WHO DARE TO COME NEAR THE TREE!
Just in case you forget, gatekeeper reinforced with powerful spells in order to succcessly guard the tree. So don't hesitate to use them as you like as long as you don't point it to the tree. If one spell is not enough, then two will be suffice, what about three ? (Pssh, monsters don't know about your power, poor them)

______________

PET TD – HIGHLIGHTS
______________
• Dozens of cute pets to summon
• Summon common, rare, epic and legendary pets
• Use your best strategy to place your pets for the best defense
• Upgrade your pets to increase their effectiveness
• Each pet has their own unique abilities and secondary powers
• Defend against endless waves of monsters
• Prepare to face variety of enemy bosses, each with their own unique skills
• Cast, upgrade, and unlock spells to destroy monsters, rebuild defences and buff your pets
• A combination game from tower defense and idle

ZEGORDIA KINGDOM'S FATE IS IN YOUR HAND, DOWNLOAD PET TD AND PROTECT THE TREE OF LIFE!
summary: Protect the Tree of Life from Enemy and Summon Your Own Legendary Pet..

title: Eggsotic (Free)
description:
This 2D platformer game is a physic dependent game where the player plays as an egg falling off tree branches trying to get to its nest. 

Try to arrive at the nest without cracking the egg. obstacles are placed in a way which can be difficult to avoid. Control the physics of the game (speed, friction, jump velocity). Play strategically. 

When you get a rhythm you can beat every stage!

title: Võ Thần Vô Song
description:
VÕ THẦN VÔ SONG : THIÊN BIẾN ĐỘI HÌNH - TRẢM VẠN ĐỊCH NHÂN 
--------------------------------------
VÕ THẦN VÔ SONG : THIÊN BIẾN ĐỘI HÌNH - TRẢM VẠN ĐỊCH NHÂN
Đăng nhập tặng ngay cả một đội hình tướng khủng : Triệu Vân, Tôn Kiên, Đại Kiều, Tôn Thượng Hương, Chân Mật.
Quà tặng hấp dẫn mỗi ngày! Online là nhận thưởng! Lên VIP 5 không cần nạp.

【Đồ Họa Console – Nâng Tầm Đẳng Cấp】
Tạo hình nhân vật 3D theo chuẩn Tam Quốc cực kỳ đẹp mắt và kỳ công, vô vàn hiệu ứng kỹ năng  hoành tráng và bắt mắt, ngắm là mê, chơi là nghiền!
【1 Đội Hình – Trảm Vạn Địch】
Võ Thần Vô Song mang đến một tính năng đặc biệt, tướng trảm sát NPC càng nhiều thì càng mạnh. Sử dụng một đội hình có thể trảm vạn địch.
【Khắc Chế Bằng 36 Kế】
Tính chiến thuật trong Vo Than Vo Song cực kỳ đa dạng : 5 hành tương khác, 7 binh thư, 9 bí kíp đội hình…tất cả tạo thành 36 kế khắc chế địch. 
【Thành Thân Với Nhân Vật Tam Quốc】
Trong Võ Thần Vô Song, lần đầu tiên người chơi có thể tự mình thành thân với các mỹ nhân thời xưa. Bạn muốn Đại Kiều, Tiểu Kiều hay Điêu Thuyền là thê tử của mình?
【Hóa Thân Triệu Vân – Xoay Vần Tam Quốc】
Tham gia game Vo Than Vo Song, người chơi sẽ được hóa thân vào Triệu Vân, cùng Triệu Vân giải cứu Đại Kiều, được Vu Cát giúp đỡ, được Tôn Thượng Hương và Tôn Kiên nương nhờ…dần dần tạo thành một thế lực riêng, xoay vần cục diện Tam Quốc. Bạn sẽ thống nhất Tam Quốc, trở thành Hoàng Đế trong Võ Thần Vô Song.

DÒNG MÁY HỖ TRỢ:
Android 4.3 trở lên. Ram 2g+
CHI TIẾT XEM TẠI: 
Fanpage : https://www.facebook.com/vothanvosong/
Group: https://vothanvs.net/
Phone CSKH: 19006639_nhánh 2 / hỗ trợ quốc tế: 84 - - 39743410 (ext 156)
Key word : tam quoc, game tam quoc, vo than vo song, thien ha anh hung, tam quốc

title: Farm Tycoon - life idle simulator clicker strategy
description:
This is a real life simulator agronomist.
A fascinating economic strategy clicker! Build your successful business in the village.
First you are a poor farmer. The goal is the future, where you are a tycoon, millionaire and businessman.
And between these stages a whole life. Show yourself as a digger, dig a potato, sell it on the market and get money. To dig a potato bush you just need to click or tap on the screen. Dig as if there is oil under the ground and you want to be like an oil tycoon!
You start in your village. After all, your village is your homeland. In this area you have a farm where you grow your first crop. To trade on the exchange, you will need an economy to know what price you are comfortable with. In the future, you will be the only millionaire in the village and you will have the opportunity to colonize Mars, grab land from politicians and melt the snow in Siberia. After all, dragons will help you in this! Also, do not forget to get a real tractor for cultivating the land in the beginning! You will have a huge empire!
Let's get started! Download the game and go from farmer to millionaire.
Become a real potato Baron! Build your empire!
And then I'll call you the Potato Baron!

title: Bloons Adventure Time TD
description:
The Bloons have invaded the Land of Ooo and it’s up to Finn, Jake and the monkeys to stop them! Bloons Adventure Time TD is an awesome crossover between the award-winning animated series Adventure Time and the #1 Tower Defense game, Bloons TD!
 
GET YOUR HERO ON!
*Pop Bloons as your favorite Adventure Time characters like Finn, Jake, Princess Bubblegum, Marceline and more!
*Recruit brand-new monkey heroes like Captain Cassie, C4 Charlie, and Sai the Shadow!

A NEW ADVENTURE!
*Play your way through over 15 adventures and 50 maps!
*Original story featuring the voice cast of the animated series!

MAKE THE BLOONS GO BOOM!
*Equip your heroes with 200+ weapons and items from Adventure Time and Bloons TD history!

title: Evertile: Battle Arena CCG Tactics
description:
Welcome to Evertile the ultimate TCG battle arena game!
In an epic world of fantasy, unique characters are battling to honor their King and Queen in a ruthless clash tournament.

Control the strongest warlords, monsters and heroes: Strong and cunning warriors, royale mages, powerful wizards, dark witches, and more heroes and monsters that hold great powers and destructive elements.

Evertile is an epic competitive turn-based strategy card collection game (TCG) where every player must develop his own deck heroes and tactics to achieve victory.
Upgrade your deck heroes and battle legendary PVP arenas against your friends and other players from all around the world!

Use cunning strategies, wipe out the enemy tiles from the battlefield, and push for victory!
Fight in epic games of TCG and clash with the enemy king in a unique strategy tournament of royal PVP. 

Compete with other mobile legends to become the ultimate strategy king in a royal pvp battle that mixes chess, card tiles and enemy warlords.

"Evertile: Battle Arena CCG Tactics" is different from other card games - it's an epic turn based strategy TCG that is a clash between a chess game and a card strategy war game, where you control warlords fighting for their royal king or a queen fighting to become the ultimate mobile legends

MAIN FEATURES

● Clash in a real time tournament against friends and opponents from all around the world to win special rewards and trophies
● Open card chests, collect powerful new hero and monster tiles or upgrade your existing deck
● Crush your enemies’ skulls in battle and taste sweet victory in this ultimate fantasy war card game
● Become a pro deck builder and create your own mobile legends winning strategy in this unique CCG
● Compete in multiple 1V1 PVP Arenas and become the strongest warrior
● Use your wits as a chess game player to decide on your next move. Your strategy will define your fate!
● Play with an Immersive Clan System - Donate cards to your clan mates and level up together
● Chat and cooperate with your friends, exchange strategy & tactics and brag about your victories

Forget about battle royale - instead, play royal card games of chess styled TCG turn based strategy, where you need to plan every move and leave nothing for the hands of fate!

ATTENTION! "Evertile: Battle Arena CCG Tactics" is a TCG free to play game. However, some game items and packages can be purchased for real money.

To disable this option, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app.

An active Internet connection is required in order to play "Evertile: Battle Arena CCG Tactics". Join the Battle Royale celebration today!
Warlords, join our discord community here   https://discord.gg/8hGbr3J

title: Clancraft
description:
Who can rule over the realm with unheard of power left by ancestors?
60 chiefs across the globe are ready to fight. Over 20 troops await your summons to battle.

60 enter, 1 survives! Crush your enemies with your brains and brawn.

Remember to scout before you attack!

Friend, feud, and chat with players around the world in real time.
Enjoy a fair gaming environment!

title: Tic Tac Quest
description:
How about experiencing a classic strategy game in a different way?

Tick Tack Toe, Naughts and Crosses or Xs and Os - no matter the name, you already spent a few minutes in this fast and easy to learn paper-and-pencil game.

It's your chance to remember your best moves, fight against a horde of enemies and save the castle!

GAME HIGHLIGHTS:

● No internet connection required to play.

● Free, no real money purchases and no invasive banners / ads (you only watch if you want)

● 14 enemies with unique abilities will challenge you every battle.

● 3 heroes who can be trained to take you farther.

● Spend time in an epic way :-)

--

FAQ ABOUT PERMISSIONS REQUIRED:

● WRITE / READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE is required to save game progress as well as load and display ads.

title: 叫我幕府大將軍~我的後宮遍佈全世界
description:
《叫我幕府大將軍~我的後宮遍佈全世界》是一款以日式異世界官場戀愛手遊。

【故事劇情】
現實世界，你被黑心企業盤剝，突遇過勞死。然而，再次睜眼，你發現身處之地亦非天堂地獄，而是充滿欲望與權利的異世界，開始了新的人生……
異世界中的你，該何去何從？是玩弄權利的高手？還是不愛江山愛美人的情圣？命運掌握在你的手中！
亞瑟王、凱撒、亞歷山大、武田信玄、阪本龍馬…眾多史上著名的偉人任你驅策；
埃及艷后、聖女貞德、奧林匹亞斯、紫式部、織田市…無數佳人任你縱情把玩。

【遊戲特色】 官品系統：
仕途艱辛，憑藉心機化解危難，一步一步爬到政權頂峰，統領軍權，一人之下，萬人之上。還不滿意？廢除皇帝，直接登基，所有人對你俯首稱臣。
 門客系統： 異世界中，近百名历史偉人作為門客登場，對你言聽計從，助你一臂之力，實現野心。都是出來混的，人一定要多！
  紅顏系統： 後宮三千不是夢，一切盡在異世界。一個人的路孤獨寂寞，能有紅顏相伴，乃人生一大幸事。嫌後宮三千佳麗太多？尋個傾國傾城的美女，窮極一生，鐘情一人。

尋訪系統：
尋訪紅顏于市井，俘獲美人芳心。絕世美女，你是否都能將她們帶回家？想做什麼就做什麼！

子嗣系統：
娶了美女回家，生兒育女，撫養長大成人，和別人聯姻，為仕途之路增添家族勢力。

聯盟系統： 集結志同道合的盟友，組建強大的聯盟組織，在紛爭不斷的異世界，強強聯合才是生存之道！

屬下靜候將軍蒞臨異世界！


關注我們：
Facebook官方粉絲頁：https://www.facebook.com/mufudajiangjun/
客服郵箱：service@mufudajiangjun.com

title: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realm War
description:
Experience exciting, tactical, live multiplayer battles with stunning visuals and audio based on the epic fantasy universe, Warhammer Age of Sigmar.

Fight and battle in an ultimate action pvp challenge to rule the Mortal Realms.
Amass an army of powerful cards including Generals, Heroes and Summons. Collect cards, level them up and use their power to crush your opponents on the battlegrounds of the arena.

Choose from many unique cards to create your own deck strategies. Deploy your powerful units to the battlefield and send them to combat. Enhance your tactics by deciding when to unleash legendary game changing General and Hero Special Powers, designed to combine with infinite potential.

Send your heroes to take control of the mighty Realmgate and boost your deck with unique and super powered cards. These legendary magic cards can be played without cost, so choose your moment wisely.
 
Rise to a legend and become the ultimate Warlord!
Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realm War is a true fusion of MOBA and PvP duel card battler.

FEATURES

•	Command mighty Generals from Stormcast Eternals to Orruk Megabosses 
•	Collect a wide range of powerful, unique cards and power them up in multiple ways 
•	Build your deck to win based on unique tactics and strategy 
•	Recruit an army of warriors, war machines, heroes with epic attacks and battle skills
•	Fight magic wars in a brand new deck building moba and destroy your enemy 
•	Unleash mighty Hero Powers and unique General Special Abilities 
•	Combine cards, powers, abilities and strategy for victory and glory 
•	Defeat opponents, win battle rewards and power your way up the duel ranks 
•	Experience short, explosive action-packed pvp battles 
•	Gain access to new cards and battle arenas as you move up the ranks 
•	Best-in-class next-gen 3D visuals on mobile 
•	Log-in daily to collect mystical comets and complete quests with valuable treasure

Support
For help and support please contact - https://pixeltoysltd.freshdesk.com/support/home

Privacy Policy
http://www.pixeltoys.com/privacy-policy/

Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realm War is completely free to download, it is possible to play through the game without purchase, however some in game items, features and enhancements can be optionally purchased using real money. If you do not wish to use these features you can disable in app purchases in your device settings.

Pixel Toys might partner with mobile advertising companies and other companies that help deliver advertisements specific to your interests. For more information about such advertising practices, and to opt-out in mobile apps, see http://www.pixeltoys.com/privacy-policy/.

title: Texas Lotto Buddy
description:
The Original! Texas Lotto Buddy (TLB) helps frequent players of the scratch games of the Texas Lottery know the odds of their favorite games every day. The app provides detailed analysis of each game, identifies winning & losing pack numbers or packs eligible/ineligible for the games grand prize, and a host of other important information! TLB gives players the ability to scan a ticket before it has been scratched and get instant analytics! Additionally, the map feature lets players know where winning tickets have been purchased! There is so much inside and it's updated every morning. TLB is the most in-depth app available for advanced analytics on the scratch games of the Texas Lottery. When used as a supplement to your existing strategy, TLB can help add the one-two punch to boost your game!

Buy. Scan. Know.

title: Major Command Risk & Strategy Game ★Companion App★
description:
★★ This app is not a game! ★★

You must be a registered player at majorcommand.com to use this app.

Major Command is a world domination, conquest style strategy and risk game. It is similar to the classic RISK board game. Major Command is designed to be played on a desktop or laptop computer. It is NOT recommended to play Major Command Game on a phone.

This app serves as way to receive turn notifications on your phone if you are a Major Command Game player.

If you are currently a registered player at Major Command (MajCom), then you can use this app to receive turn notifications on your phone. It will also display new messages, as well as link to the website via your phone's browser.

This app is lightweight and simple to use.

★★ Features: ★★

- Display the number of waiting turns
- Display the time remaining for your most recent turn
- Give notifications of new turns
- Link to your games page
- Display the number of unread private messages
- Give notifications of new messages
- Link to your inbox
- Link to your profile page
- Link to the forum
- Link to the blog page (which is now fully responsive and mobile friendly)

More features will be added when possible.

★ MORE INFO ★

Please visit MajorCommand.com on your desktop or laptop if you wish to play the world's best strategy, conquest, world domination, and risk game. :-)

Thank you and enjoy!

Website and Social
Website: https://www.majorcommand.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/MajorCommand/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MajorCommand
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZyjSrBb8UMCnU_06nr5rMg

title: Grand Strategy
description:
Inspired by the board game Risk, Grand Strategy is a turn-based game for two to ten players. The game is designed to be played in real-time, or in a slower turn-based mode where you play one or two turns every day in as many as thirty different games. 

The game features a twenty hour turn mode where you log in once or twice a day and take a few turns. As the player base grows, you should be able to find opponents for real-time games.

Grand Strategy must be played online. There is no offline mode. The game is Player vs Player. There is no option to play against AI.

The mobile client that is available on Google Play is an early release. It is has been tested on a few select phones. Don't try playing the game on a smaller screen device.

The game is only playable on 1080p screen size or larger -- preferably a tablet, large phone or Chrome OS device.

There are no Ads.

There is a free Windows or Linux client available on the Denizen Seven web site. If you're having trouble on your phone, that version is recommended until the game is more playable on smaller screens.

title: 9 Nations
description:
9 Nations is a open source turn based strategy game with a fantasy setting. Build and manage your own cities, and expand into other ventures, research technologies, and train units to explore new lands. Explore the world. But do not forget your home civilizans or your will lose their support and your cities will fall in chaos.
Select one of 9 nations (at the moment their is only one) and find your way between the fragile balance that existed between the ancient races. Prepare for a strategy adventure.

The Early Access version V0.1 includes
* 36 different buildings
* 31 Researches
* 18 different actions, like build, fight, shop, upgrade, ...
* 16 Ressources
* 7 Different units
* 7 Terrains
* 5 supported systems (Windows, Mac, Linux, Android, Website)
* 4 different scenarios
* 3 different maps
* 2 tutorials
* 1 campaign
* 1 nation (at the moment)
* and lot’s of work 🙂

title: World of Navy : Battle Warship
description:
The best naval battle strategy game,providing players an immersing experience in real maritime wars.
A vast expanse of world map, scattered with bases of thousands of players and rich resource mines,own massive naval fleet,play with millions of online players from all over the world! 
Commander,with your understanding of tactics and flexible strategy,you can build your naval empire,lead your nation to conquer all of the world and establish a glorious World.

= GAME FEATURES=

Exquisite and vivid depiction of warship details makes you feel watching real naval battles
- Warship: Exclusive performance for each Destroyer, Cruiser, Submarine and Aircraft Carrier
- Mech: Mech and Warships jointly fight with the enemy
- Cruise Missile: Cruise Missile make a fatal blow
- Strategic Bomber: Provide air support during naval battles

A variety of ways to fight
- Take a separate adventure in conquest to get huge rewards
- Team up with other players to join allied combat for Gems,Devices and much more items! 

Various ways to enhance your navy's power
- Researching technology has a great impact on the entire country
- Learning skills to supply your commander with superior power
- Manufacturing device to equip them on your military base
 
Create alliance and dominate the sea
- Create an alliance where you can get help from members, and obtain exclusive gifts
- Assist each other to defeat the enemy in naval war
- Participate in alliance challenge with alliance members to get rewards

Wonderful and diverse events to participate
- Mysterious Waters: Explore Mysterious Waters with alliance members to win the team glory 
- Mech War: Eliminate the enemy's mech to win the reward of victory
- Crystal Island: Alliance fights for crystal islands
- Pirate Crisis: Team up with other commanders to eliminate pirates
- Navy Competition: Challenge other Commanders to rise in rank and claim eternal glory! 

Real-time trading system
- Trade resources in a real-time online market

Play with global players
- Play & chat online with millions of other players from all over the world! 
- Build your own base,find more allies and fight for your nation!

title: Fiend Legion
description:
Choose a Hero, build your deck and become the ultimate battle strategist as you lead your legion to victory in fast-paced PVP matches! 

Fiend Legion is a high-stakes strategic card game played on stunning boards that challenge players with traps and terrain changes.

Challenge your friends and hone your skill, discover new players and play-styles and enter tournaments to climb leaderboards! 

Custom deck-building lets you experiment with strategies! Choose monsters and magic that fit your personal play-style or challenge yourself with the unfamiliar!

EARLY ACCESS FEATURES:

- Quick-match with players online or play with friends
- Choose from a variety of mighty Heroes - each with a distinctive power and personality - to head your Legion
- Create your Legion with four tiers of powerful card units designed in a colourful and dramatic fantasy aesthetic
- Experience the Crystal Realm with a range of stunning game-boards, each with unique terrain challenges
- Place Mana Vaults and manage resources
- Regular content updates, new cards and heroes to be added

COMING 2019

- Guilds, tournaments and leaderboards
- Cross-Platform PC play
- Single-player story mode chapters that explore the lore and world of Fiend Legion
- New cosmetic and content releases

PVP requires an internet connection.

title: Roman Battles
description:
Take Gaul for Rome! Build armies, garrison fortifications and issue orders to your legions on the world map in real time battles.

Fight battles with over 2000 soldiers encompassing 15 different units from 3different factions (Rome & Gaul) with up coming Germania & Britannia releases .

Automatically create armies by faction or methodically create your army manually, choosing your company captains and army general.

Control your army in battle by issuing orders to your captains and their companies or to your entire army.

Quick battle armies with automatic army deployments or manually deployments to choose where army soldiers will face off.

View the contents of your armies after creation and dynamically edit individual soldier attributes.

title: ASTROKINGS
description:
A 4X-like Sci-Fi MMO real-time strategy game of cosmic civilizations!

Clash with rivals in powerful cosmic battles, manage futuristic resources and build planetary facilities on countless worlds in a bid to become the absolute galactic imperator in this epic, sci-fi real-time strategy multiplayer saga. Download ASTROKINGS to experience PvP on a universal scale!

Game story collaboration with New York Times bestselling authors Amie Kaufman and Jay Kristoff of the Illuminae Files series, which won numerous awards such as the esteemed Aurealis Award for Best Science Fiction novel in 2015 and 2016!

The Nebula Imperium is no more – the emperor is dead. Untold number of worlds that served as the second cradle of mankind now lie in ruins. The unfathomable alien invaders -the Crux- and vile pirates are razing civilizations to the ground. In midst of the chaos, various factions forge federations to vie for supremacy and dominance. It is time for you to rewrite history and carve your throne in the stars.

FEATURES
≛ Revitalize your planet!
-	Construct and upgrade buildings and rebuild your planet in ruins.
-	Recruit galactic heroes to set planetary policies, harvest resources and lead your fleets to victory and conquest.
-	Vanquish space pirates and galactic criminals to gain spoils of war.

≛ Crush your rivals in all-out space fleet battles!
-	Build frigates, interceptors and motherships to amass powerful fleets to wage war. 
-	Research weapons and technologies to strengthen your nation’s power and prestige.
-	Join or lead a galactic federation with players around the world to drive out alien fleets and aspire to become the defender of humanity.
 
≛ 4X-like MMO space war of REAL-TIME STRATEGY
-	Defeat hordes of enemy forces with your allies in massive PvP clashes.
-	Gain state-of-the-art equipment and arms through your federation and dominate your foes.
-	Battle and conquer enemies to secure precious resources in the mobile strategy game of cosmic scale!

＞ Official Facebook:  www.facebook.com/playastrokings

＞ Official Twitter:  www.twitter.com/playastrokings

＞ Homepage:  www.playastrokings.com

＞ Customer Service:  support@angames.co.kr
 
NOTE:  ASTROKINGS is completely free to download and play - however, you can purchase some game items using real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please select password protection for purchases in your Google Play Store app. Internet connection is also required. Wi-Fi connection is recommended.

title: Wizard Royale: Sorcerer PVP
description:
The creators of warin.space bring you Wizard Royale. An action packed, royale knock back wizard fighting multiplayer game. Fight with real people all over the world with many different spells. Knock them out of the arena into the lava to inflict more damage.

Join us on Discord and find other players, suggest features, ask questions, tips and information on updates to the game : https://discord.gg/CpcerHb 

Development Pathway
Guild Overhaul - We're revamping guilds to have guild battles, ranking, more guild controls and more.
Game Recording and Sharing - The ability to record your games and share your favorite moments with your friends
New Challenges and Arena types - New game modes, New Styles of arenas, More variety in game play
Spells - New Spells well be added regularly

Game
In game you battle in arenas where the goal is to knock out your opponent with your spells. You earn rewards for winning, and your MMR will go up and down depending on winning.

Spells
With lots of spells to choose from you can build a custom deck that fits exactly your play style. Level your cards from 1 to 5, 10, all the way to 15 for maximum effect of your favorite spells. All spells have specific traits, most can knock back players and the more health they've lost the more knock back they will take.

Play
Play against others all over the world and increase your ranking. Your MMR (Match Making Rank) will find you worthy competition. 

Rewards
There are many different types of chests and many ways to get them. Namely playing games, or winning challenges.
Opening chests will give you new cards to level up your favorite or give you new spells to include in your decks, experience, gold, gems.

Challenges
With lots of current game modes, 10 FFA (free for all), 4FFA, 2 vs 2, and many others; there are many ways to play games and more to come.

Shop
Find new cards and your favorites to buy for coins and chests to buy for gems.

Guilds
Join up with your friends and other players to create the top guild. Soon to come guild tournaments, guild battles, guild rewards and much more.

title: Robot Recall - Zombie War Z
description:
Robot Recall - Zombie War Z 2018 

Protect your empire by shooting and battling the zombie army that wants to steal your resources in Robot Recall - Zombie War Z 2018 , a strategy RPG and base building war game. Recall the robot and plan an attack with your own Robotics soldiers! Develop your kingdom and befriend empire allies to combat both zombie and human enemies. Do you have what it takes to be the strongest commander?

A deadly futuristic robot war has just begun with the safety mission of your kingdom. Are you capable of living in hell? Meet the real challenge, save the world, defend the camp, Beat as many zombies as possible and become the zombie killer with futuristic robots! Aim your enemy's bots and destroy them by hitting fire button. Throw bombs and keep shooting as fast as you can. You can increase your strength and stability by upgrading your Military futuristic robot. 

Play as a hero robot and start the infected zombies and save the humanity from the zombie evils. Robot Recall - Zombie War Z is a zombie-themed free-to-play war strategy game. Battle zombie troops and survivors to protect your empire against the upcoming zombie war. Team up with friends from around the world to build an army, increase your zombie defense strategy and participate in special events. Take part in brutal zombie warfare and build a robotics army to grow your empire – surviving the zombie apocalypse is in your hands in Robot Recall - Zombie War Z!
And war is not easy, you must take care.

Features of Robot Recall - Zombie War Z

Free FPS game
Stunning 3D zombie shooting war scene
Best sniper rifles in world
Wifi unnecessary
Super intense Boss battle
 basic enemy types, from crawling zombies to strong mutant creatures.
7 types of giant mutant bosses for extra action.
plenty types of zombies to challenge with
Distinctive zombies to fight, making the game easy but challenging!
Plenty of fun levels get you never bored!
Special equipment upgrade system also upgrades your enjoyment!
Regular free updates with more missions and upgrades.

Enjoy the special robotics vs zombie game of 2018
descriptionHTML:
Robot Recall - Zombie War Z 2018

Protect your empire by shooting and battling the zombie army that wants to steal your resources in Robot Recall - Zombie War Z 2018 , a strategy RPG and base building war game. Recall the robot and plan an attack with your own Robotics soldiers! Develop your kingdom and befriend empire allies to combat both zombie and human enemies. Do you have what it takes to be the strongest commander?

A deadly futuristic robot war has just begun with the safety mission of your kingdom. Are you capable of living in hell? Meet the real challenge, save the world, defend the camp, Beat as many zombies as possible and become the zombie killer with futuristic robots! Aim your enemy's bots and destroy them by hitting fire button. Throw bombs and keep shooting as fast as you can. You can increase your strength and stability by upgrading your Military futuristic robot.

Play as a hero robot and start the infected zombies and save the humanity from the zombie evils. Robot Recall - Zombie War Z is a zombie-themed free-to-play war strategy game. Battle zombie troops and survivors to protect your empire against the upcoming zombie war. Team up with friends from around the world to build an army, increase your zombie defense strategy and participate in special events. Take part in brutal zombie warfare and build a robotics army to grow your empire – surviving the zombie apocalypse is in your hands in Robot Recall - Zombie War Z!
And war is not easy, you must take care.

Features of Robot Recall - Zombie War Z

Free FPS game
Stunning 3D zombie shooting war scene
Best sniper rifles in world
Wifi unnecessary
Super intense Boss battle
basic enemy types, from crawling zombies to strong mutant creatures.
7 types of giant mutant bosses for extra action.
plenty types of zombies to challenge with
Distinctive zombies to fight, making the game easy but challenging!
Plenty of fun levels get you never bored!
Special equipment upgrade system also upgrades your enjoyment!
Regular free updates with more missions and upgrades.

Enjoy the special robotics vs zombie game of 2018
summary: Robot Recall - Zombie War Z hero survival Game

title: Dreams Defender
description:
It's time to visit your sleepy swamp! Survive the attack and win enemies! New free RPG strategy game can show what type of a defender you are. D-D and Fair invite you to the unbelievable fantasy kingdom of dreams. We are in need of a very brave defender. Be the hero of legends!

There is a dark shadow of nightmares scattering over the clearing of dreams.
Monsters are coming with huge crowds and becoming more and more agressive. The world tree of dreams is in a big danger. And when dangerous monsters succeed in breaching defense, our dreams will turn to endless nightmares! So we don't have another choice, except to survive the attack and defend the swamp and the tree of dreams from all the possible beasts. Help funny forest ghost D-D to protect our dreams. Think, how could you upgrade the hero. Think of the magical skills, which Fair should use firstly. It is not so easy to defense, the player should be clever and think quickly. Collect martial magical artifacts, use special skills, develop and combine standard skills. Develop the character and its partner. Think of tactics and make up strategies. Fight with different beasts and big BOSSES! Take part in new exciting adventures! Be brave enough to go forward to the final battle and the victory over the grand evil!

Peculiarities of the game:

- unbelievable variety of enemies
- unique big bosses
- game of the Tower Defender type
- possibility to update the hero due to many characteristics
- variety of standard attacks
- special magical spells to defend and survive attacks
- daily unique tasks
- prizes, bonuses and presents
- all the possible achievements
- search and collecting of magical artifacts
- exciting dynamics and easy gameplay

Dreams defender is a great combination of popular games. This game is of thу Tower Defender type, classical RPG and the real strategy. It is also a unique fantasy world with colorful and funny characters. Game dynamics, its variety, the special plot thought of to the very details and design of the game, which will make any player happy and everybody could have a lot of fun playing this game. Start the game, you are going to be a new hero of this exciting legend! Adventures start right now.

title: Billion Lords
description:
Once upon a time, the Underworld was ruled by Lord of Evil…
Driven by his endless ambition, he reached out above the underground…
To stop Lord of Evil, God of Light assembled an army of heroes.
With the help of God of Light, Lord of Evil was defeated by heroes.  

The death of Lord of Evil ignited the Underworld.
All Lords began to fortify their dungeons and gather their armies, to fight for the empty throne.

A war is about to begin…


Features:
- Dungeon building: Create your very own dungeon with traps, and lead your enemies to their doom.
- Gather troops: Summon a wild cast of Generals and Minions, each of which features their own abilities and appearances. 
- Hero invasion: Defend invading heroes and tap to cast spells to annihilate them! 
- Evil League: Ally and interact with other Lords to unlock perks and benefits. The more the eviler! 
- League Arena: Challenge your fellow League members in real-time to prove your with.

title: AR Tank Wars
description:
AR Tank Wars is the most addictive Augmented Reality War game ever. Turn your living room into a battlefield and start battling enemy tanks. Thanks to the latest ARCore technologies this game makes the best AR experience possible!

The goal of this addictive battle game is to go fight against enemy armies of tanks, guard towers, and helicopters and smash them before they destroy you. The game contains a very wide selection of missions and you can replay as much as you want to fully score the max number of stars for each mission.

AR Tank Wars brings the classic war and battle game genre to your living room, using augmented reality with an amazing and awesome battlefield environment that will give you a great experience in this world of tanks.

Why do you need to download AR Tank Wars on your phone or tablet instead of other addictive battle army games and AR games?

◆ Unique Experience ◆
• The game uses the latest ARCore technologies to give the best possible AR user experience possible. 
• Challenging campaigns awaits which becomes harder as your progress on. But, don't give up and try to complete all mission.
• Beautiful and very high-quality graphics in the most addictive mobile AR game!
• An unique battlefield simulation.

◆ Easy Controls ◆
• We care about you and that's why we made the gameplay controls easy to play, the battles however become a lot more challenging the further you progress in the campaigns.

◆ Free ◆
• AR Tank Wars is Free and it will stay free for life, so there are no hidden fees, no in app purchases and no annual subscription fees to enjoy the most addictive augmented reality game ever!

So, What are you waiting for? Go download AR Tank Wars now and enjoy playing the most addictive augmented reality war game ever!

title: Star Trek™ Trexels II
description:
Take command of your favorite ships as you search the galaxy for iconic Star Fleet officers. Manage your crew, seek out strange worlds, and explore this new frontier. 

FEATURES
● Collect Picard, Spock, Janeway, Kirk, Data, and all your other favorite Star Trek™ characters!
● Build your ships to maximize efficiency and suit them to your play style!
● Explore a host of new planets in interactive turn-based strategy away missions!
● Unlock iconic ships from across the series as you amass your fleet!
● Engage other players in head-to-head turn-based ship battles!
● The iconic science fiction universe you love is back in incredible 8-bit pixel art!

Please Note: Star Trek™ Trexels II is a free-to-play game, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

An internet connect is required to play.

title: Wring & Smash - Tower Defense
description:
Natural resources are becoming scarce. The goverment is taking measures, looking for new ways of getting energy from their machines. One of the research is led by Doctor Lianin, with the cooperation of the nearby villagers, whose ways of living have 3 main essential pillars: drink, shoot and sleep. The investigation of the Doctor has targeted the animals of the world, after discovering that the guts of the creatures transmit an energy capable of powering the machines. The plan is to use a radio tower that transmits a signal to lure the animals to it, to kill and gather their resources with the Doctor's weapons.

★ Unique cartoon art style
★ Colorful dinamic UI
★ Tons of turrets 
★ Epic powers using the animal visceras
★ Unlock new maps defeating bosses

Crazy Homeboys is a Spanish Indie Development Game Team located in Madrid by 4 game developers trying to express funny ideas.

FOLLOW US ON TWITTER: http://twitter.com/CrazyHomeboys

title: Battle of Guam 1944 (free)
description:
This is a free 20-turn-version of Battle of Guam 1944

July 1944: You are in command of the American III Amphibious Corps, tasked with taking back the control of Guam from the Imperial Japanese Army which captured the island in December 1941. In spite of the facts that reefs around Guam limited the landing site options and Japanese defenders were well aware of the incoming attack, the U.S. forces boldly landed on two separate beaches. While Guam is the largest of Mariana Islands, the small size, mere 32 miles, meant that Japanese Army quickly mobilized their forces for a series of counter attacks to push the U.S. Marines back to the ocean. 

Japanese General Shigematsu announced: ''The American enemy is planning a reckless landing on Guam. We have an excellent opportunity to annihilate him upon the beaches.'' 

Your challenge is to make the landings, hold the beachheads against the early counter attacks, and as quickly as possible to steamroll across the island, so that it can be turned into a massive U.S. base for the future operations in the Pacific campaign.



FEATURES:

+ Historical accuracy: Campaign mirrors the historical setup.

+ Thanks to in-built variation and the game's smart AI technology, each game provides a unique war gaming experience.

+ Challenging: Crush the opponent quickly and seize the top spot on the Hall of Fame.

+ Multi-layered AI: Instead of just attacking on direct line towards the target, the AI opponent balances between strategic goals and smaller tasks like encircling nearby units.

+ Settings: Various options are available to alter the look of the gaming experience: Change difficulty level, hexagon size, Animation speed, choose icon set for units (NATO or REAL) and cities (Round, Shield, Square, block of houses), decide what is drawn on the map, and much more.



The full game is available from the app store



Privacy Policy (full text on website & app menu): No account creation is possible, the made-up username used in the Hall of Fame listings is not tied to any account and does not have password. Location, personal, or device identifier data is not used in any way. In the case of crash the following non-personal data is sent (vie web-form using ACRA library) to allow quick fix: Stack trace (code which failed), Name of the App, Version number of the App, and Version number of the Android OS. The app only requests the permissions it needs to function.




This Series has offered highly rated Android-only strategy games since 2011. The campaigns are based on the time-tested gaming elements TBS (turn-based strategy) enthusiasts are familiar with from both the classic PC war games and legendary tabletop strategy board games. I also want to thank the fans for all the well thought-out suggestions over the years which have allowed these campaigns to improve at a much higher rate than what any indie developer could dream of. if you have feedback about the series please use email, this way we can have a constructive back and forth conversion without all the limits of the store's comment system. In addition, because I have huge number of projects on multiple stores, it’s just not very sensible to spend handful of hours each day going through hundreds of pages spread all over the Internet to see if somebody has posted a question somewhere -- just send me an email  and I will answer to it as soon as I'm online. Thanks for understanding!

title: SECOND AGE: WAR OF DARK LORD
description:
[ Second Age：War of Dark Lord ] is a Strategy game based on the world of Middle-Earth. For thousands of years, Humans, Dwarves, Hobbits and Elves have been thriving. They have their civilizations prospered, living peacefully between each other. However, darkness often comes after light. The evil forces led by Soren the Dark Lord are quietly spreading across the land, eroding creatures on their way. Meanwhile, Orc armies savaging livings under light resistance. Where are our heroes? Who will confront the dangers and stop the darkness? 


In game, you will experience how to build and govern a city, form an army and command the sacred expedition towards your enemy. You can form magics, tame dragons, conquer monsters, and ultimately defeat the mighty Dark Lord!


Spears shall be shaken, Shields shall be splintered! A sword-day, a red day, ere the sun rises!


Explore the unknown world with allies and experience the fierceness of real-time battle! Feel the Middle-earth world and save it from the Dark Lord!


▷▶  Rally Your Alliance
Join an alliance to develop with your trustable friends. Help each other, united to fight against the evil.

▷▶  Using Powerful Magics
You can collect and upgrade a wide range of magic cards. Fire dragon, lightning, storms… All can be released as magic, forming various combat strategies and weakening the enemy's strength.

▷▶  Different Races and Civilizations
Choosing races with different traits determines the direction of your future development. Each race has its own strengths and weaknesses in game. To survive, you need to choose the right development strategy and work with other allies.

▷▶  Global MMO Warfare
Millions of players from more than 200 regions compete with each other at the same time! Unite your allies, defend your territory and become legends!

Official Facebook：https://www.facebook.com/SecondAge.Game/

You can collect and upgrade a wide range of magic cards. Fire dragon, lightning, storms… All can be released as magic, forming various combat strategies and weakening the enemy's strength.

▷▶ Different Races and Civilizations
Choosing races with different traits determines the direction of your future development. Each race has its own strengths and weaknesses in game. To survive, you need to choose the right development strategy and work with other allies.

▷▶ Global MMO Warfare
Millions of players from more than 200 regions compete with each other at the same time! Unite your allies, defend your territory and become legends!

title: RAGNAROK Vikings at War
description:
Play RAGNAROK - Vikings at War, a classic MMO strategy game, and enter the mysterious world of the Vikings. Battle with thousands of other players in an epic war for power. Raise your kingdom and become a living legend!

"Land!", yells the Jarl from the bow of the longboat. It took many days to cross a storm-lashed sea and reach your destination. As the fog lifts, you glimpse the shores of East Anglia. Many miles away from home, you are ready to do what is the trade of the Vikings: to plunder, pillage and conquer. However, this time it looks as if the Anglians are prepared to hold their ground. They stand along the coast with shield poised and swords drawn and await your landing. Hammering your fists on chests and shields with full power, you and your clan unleash an intimidating sound of war. You are ready to feast with the gods in Valhalla. But this time, Odin must wait. The end will come, and the world of gods and men shall wane. But not today! Not before you have claimed your victory! Not before bards shall sing about your deeds in their songs!

RAGNAROK - Vikings at War is a classic construction and strategy MMO featuring PvE and PvP. You impersonate a fearless Viking warrior and manage a settlement. The game features an authentic medieval world with dozens of kingdoms and countries to raid and conquer. Striving for wealth and power, you send your ships in all directions. With the right tactics and strategy, your warriors will return on ships filled to bursting point with goods and gold. The treasures and loot of your raids help you to evolve your settlement into a big trade town. Band up with other players, form a clan and take part in challenging PvE and PvP fights. Win in events and climb the ranks, so that you can equip your avatar with decorative armor.

Features:
- Awesome builder and strategy game with more than 20 unique buildings and a rewarding trade system
- An epic war strategy game featuring trainable Viking heroes and tactical challenges
- Realistic Viking setting with music that befits the scene and stunning graphics
- Competitive content featuring PvE, PvP and rewarded rankings. Measure yourself with other players!
- Enjoy exciting content with events, clans, single & multiplayer battles, achievements, events, a ranking system and much more to explore
- Join thousands of players across many platforms in a single shared MMO game world (The game supports e.g. Android and iOS Smartphones and Tablets, PC, Facebook, and others)
- There are no horned helmets here ;)

RAGNAROK - Vikings at War is a free-2-play game with in-app-purchases and rewarded videos to speed up game progression.

Thank you for playing our game! We are always striving to improve RAGNAROK - Vikings at War. If you have any suggestions or ideas, we are more than happy to hear from you through our support team.

RAGNAROK - Vikings at War website: http://vikingsatwar.com

title: Robinson’s Island
description:
Explore its mysteries, collect resources and build an island of paradise. This is the real challenge as you will have to fight for resources with wild animals, local aborigines and cope with natural disasters. Everyday brings new challenges and adventures.  

Starting from the wreckage of your boat build your camp base, adding new support structures and grow your facilities. Collect resources, build buildings, harvest crops and defend them from cruel aboriginals. Steadily explore the island and uncover the map, extending your reign over the island. 

Features:
* Explore a new world 
* Fight aboriginals that lurk behind every bush
* Make use of dozens of island resources
* 20 buildings to upgrade, defend and improve your village.
* Develop technologies to be able to build a new boat and set sail from the island

title: Art of War: Red Tides
description:
Team up and battle against commanders from all around the world. In Art of War: Red Tides, victory cannot be guaranteed by money, but strategy and teamwork.

Game mechanics:
It is as simple as follows
- Set troop: select a race, choose ten units under this race to set up your troop and then join the battle.
- Send troop: you have 12 seconds to prepare during each wave, and you need to observe the battle, speculate enemy’s intention and then send appropriate types and number of units to the battlefield.
- Destroy enemy turrets and base: continually overwhelm each enemy, use Commander Skills, cooperate with your teammates, pull down their three turrets one by one, and destroy their base.

Simple as the battle is, you will still experience various strategies and tactics in each battle.

Game features:
- Team up and battle against commanders from all corners of the world
- Support over 200 units that can fight smart in the fiery battle at the same time
- Command concisely, play smart, and operate conveniently on different devices
- With over 120 kinds of units in three races, the game emphasizes Strategic Thinking, the core element reflected in the classic strategy games. It is easy to learn but hard to master.

Monetization:
- Art of War: Red Tides adopts “free download + in-game purchase” pattern.

Let us start our journey, commanders!

-Privacy policy: http://cc.yingxiong.com/site/protocol.html；
-Terms of service：http://cc.yingxiong.com/site/protocol.html；

title: War of Summoners:Empire. War. Glory
descriptionHTML:
Here comes the super strategic MOBA game at the end of 2018! Save the world with tens of thousands of worldwide players! Summoners with different skills gather around, pick their weapons, and defeat the plots of the evil scientists! Come create a team of super summoners and battle in the continent of Astraea! Along with your favorite summoners in War of Summoners, let's fight together!

In the rich and mysterious continent of Astraea, the evil scientist Gilras used the Gora Amethyst to control Evelia, the elf who has the ability to control the storm, and built a base in the forbidden land and summoned a ferocious beast to occupy Astraea! Come join the nine-tailed fox Nida and create an unexpected team of summoners against Gilras to save the world in an epic strategic battle!

The War of Summoners is a popular game of strategic confrontation. The mysterious power of Gora Amethyst and the hunger for power have made the evil scientists even more crazy! While defending the city, please stop the evil plan of Gilras and save the continent of Astraea!

War of Summoners’ Features:
√ Recruit talented summoners and fight the battles wisely with SLG strategies;
√ Have fun with different tactics using different combinations of different heroes;
√ Defend the attack in the solo mode;
√ Join like-minded players and team up to challenge multiplayer instance dungeons and league battles;
√ Real-time control, a fair competition that is always ready to start. Revert the battle in a second, fight for the arena glory, and take your own crown;
√ A great map system of missions that allows you to experience new challenges all the time;

Best strategy game of 2018! Join War of Summoners now to fight against the evil forces and save the world with tens of millions of players around the world!
summary: Fight against the evil forces and save the world with global players!

title: Arker: The legend of Ohm
description:
Explore the land of Ohm, recruit your hero and battle in exciting strategic online battles against other players.

Classes
Berserker, Alchemist, Izarian.... Discover the unique characteristics of each class as well as the best combination of abilities or objects for each class.

Clans
A hero is strong, but a clan is much stronger. Found or join a clan and fight together to get the control of Ohm's city to gain access to the ARKER mines.

ARKER
The most precious mineral that exists; desired as a coin by some and as a source of energy by others. Some have died trying to understand it, others just have adapted to its existence.

Skills
Find the perfect balance between the hundreds of abilities that exist and allow your hero to win even the most difficult battles.

Marketplace
Buy and/or sell abilities or objects in the market with other players and get a good handful of ARKER fragments in trade.

Game modes
Find an opponent for a skirmish and earn a reputation or a duel in exchange for ARKER; or go it alone in history mode (coming soon).

See you on the battlefield.

©2018 Arker Labs SC

title: Three Kingdom Defense: Han Dynasty Civil War
description:
Three Kingdoms Defense is a fantasy super defense game that will make you get hook for hours to defend China from the Rebels. Rebellion has occured in China and you will have to quell them and restore the dynasty. Use heroes like Liu Bei, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei to quell the rebellion.

Fight on forests, mountains, cities. Be prepare to use defensive strategy with towers that you can upgrade and specialised weapons. Defend your kingdom against hordes of Yellow Turbans, Evil Wizards, Robbers, Rebels, Qiang Troops, and many things to beat!

Han Dynasty need you to restore the kingdom. 

GAME FEATURES:

★ Defensive Battle that can hook you to play the game for hours!

★ Train your soldiers, melee and range attacks!

★ Upgrade your towers and customize your strategy!



★ 3 Heroes: Choose your champion to lead your troops to victory! Liu Bei, Guan Yu, and Zhang Fei


★ Unlock 18 tower abilities to help you restoring Han Dynasty

★ 100 different enemies, from Yellow Turban to Qiang Troops!

★ Big time for Boss fights! Kill the beast!

★ High definition awesome illustrated cartoon art!

★ Look up encyclopedia with information for the towers and enemies

title: Prince of Arabia: Online Strategy Game

Prince of Arabia: online strategy game is among best strategy games. It’s a fantasy story based on betrayal and revenge in this empire building strategy games. A prince of a stronghold kingdom was betrayed by his own uncle. Prince managed to escape and settled in some unknown desert. Help prince of Arabia in making empire building strategy to regain his lost dignity, pride and his rightful stronghold Kingdom. Help him making a strong tribes army and win the boom day. Rebuild a barren piece of desert in this real time strategy games. Enter the era of super tribes mania wars in this Arab clash games. Apply war fare tactics in the battlefield to rank your super tribe high. Build an empire to become legends of honor and defeat Bedouin enemies. Build super tribe defenses and win the boom day in this real time strategy games. Make best strategy games building and challenge other tribes to become the legends of honor.  Train powerful troops of Bedouin to win this best strategy game. Build an empire playing this Arab clash games and apply all your empire building strategy.

title: Undead Nation: Last Shelter
description:
[COLLECT SURVIVORS]
A wide variety of unique and powerful Survivors to recruit and train!
Collect them all and assemble the strongest team to go against zombie hordes!

[INTENSE PVP COMBAT]
Challenge other players in real-time to climb the ranks!
Position yourself to take advantage of the terrain and swing the conquest in your favor!
Fight over zombie-infested buildings and take over enemy territory to become the reigning champion of your area!

[CUSTOMIZABLE BASECAMP]
Upgrade and build facilities to create a basecamp unique to you!
Produce medicine, food, and materials to strengthen your base and your crew!
Combine rooms, set traps, and fortify your base to defend against being raided by other players!

[STRATEGIC COMBAT SYSTEM]
Discover what strategies work for you by choosing from a range of tactics that will assist you in battle!
Exploit holes in your enemies’ defenses and take control of battle!
Endless possible combinations of Survivors and tactics that evolve with your play style!

[GLOBAL ALLIANCES]
Meet other players and share ideas in Alliances from all around the world!
Work together to become the strongest Alliance in Undead Nation!

title: Trick Or Treat Defense
description: While dabbling in the black arts, you accidentally spawned multiple portals throughout all of your realms. Thus, unleashing hordes of evil little beings, known as Trick or Treaters. They will stop at nothing to devour your precious candy. Luckily, over the thousands of years of your existence, you have master many things. Including, the ability to summon monstrous creatures, which will allow to defend your candy. You must stop these Trick or Treaters at all cost, your candy depends on it!

title: World Craft: Survival & Exploration Games
description:
World Craft: SUrvival & Exploration Games permite construir uma cidade construída em um mundo plano.


Na noite você deve sobreviver do monstro, zumbis ou criaturas ruins, se esconder deles com construir um abrigo, como uma cabana ou casa de pedra, no dia em que você pode construir o que quiser, ou destruir esse bloco. n modo criativo você pode usar todos os recursos sem limite!
Biomas no World Craft: SUrvival e Exploration Games Selvas talvez seja planalto, planície, floresta coberta, savana, taiga, floresta de flores, pantanal e deserto que você pode explorá-lo.
Inclui uma grande variedade de casas modernas e muitos tipos diferentes de estruturas. Em uma extremidade da cidade há até uma fazenda com um celeiro e cavalos e assim por diante.

em World Craft: SUrvival & Exploration Games exploração de aventuras em jogos de construção, você pode construir uma cidade de pequeno porte, mas repleta de diferentes tipos de edifícios, a maioria com formas estranhas, mas que ao mesmo tempo parecem realistas e artísticas. É uma cidade muito colorida que faz uso de lã e outros tipos de blocos coloridos para dar uma sensação feliz ao que de outra forma provavelmente seria uma cidade bem chata.

elaboração e construção de recursos de exploração:
- textura em alta resolução
- ativos gráficos realistas
- Interface imbatível
- Sobrevivência e ou modo de criação, modo de voo pronto, dia e noite
- Controles convenientes do jogo
- Alta FPS, sem compromissos
- Mais possibilidades de criatividade sem restrições
- Para crianças e adultos
